SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Hmm... Don't remember it perfectly myself,
but I'm pretty sure red was in the middle.
Oh, and black was pointing to the right.

SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Kentarou_Yanagibi
SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Think I remember blue and white lining up,
with white on the left.

SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ren_Tutuki
SUB_W01_EVAR_COMM_KOMAINU_JIZO_000_CUT_0.text:
Far as we remember, red was in the middle,
and black was pointing to the right.
Also, blue and white lined up, with white
being on the left.
